Welcome to Flink AI Flow’s Documentation!¶

Contents

  • ai_flow package

  • ai_flow_plugins package

Core Classes/Modules¶

ai_flow.ai_graph.ai_graph.AIGraph

Core abstraction of Flink AI Flow. Workflows defined by users will be translated into AIGraph by the Flink AI Flow framework. AIGraph consists of AINode and edges. For edges, they are either the DataEdge between AINodes in a job or the ControlEdge between jobs.

ai_flow.api.ops

Main module for defining customized workflow. It provides users with a variety of methods(e.g. transform(), train()) to define their own machine learning workflow.

ai_flow.api.workflow_operation

Module for manipulating workflows including managing a workflow’s scheduling and execution.
